name: The Lost Oasis Hotel
description:
Welcome to The Lost Oasis Hotel! A bridge between the physical world and the afterlife. Where weary souls can rest and find acceptance before making the long and arduous journey to the great beyond.

As our newest bellboy, you will be tasked with helping our guests find acceptance by delivering packages known as "Tears" whenever they ask for it.  It may sound like a straightforward job, but you must beware of FAKE requests! The Ghost of Regret stalks these halls, and when given the chance it will try to fool you.  So pay close attention and you will be fine! 

This game was made by one developer in a week. 

Music from: Sound Collection Finder
